info.title: Nursing App API Documentation
info.description:
API documentation for the Nursing App - A platform connecting users with nursing services.
 *     
 *     ðŸ”Œ **Real-time Communication**
 *     This API also supports WebSocket channels for real-time updates.
 *     See the 'Real-time Events' tag for event schemas.
 *     
 *     **WebSocket Channels:**
 *     - Chat: private-chat.{threadId}
 *     - Full documentation in routes/channels.php
 *     
 *     **Frontend Integration:**
 *     Subscribe to channels using Laravel Echo:
 *     Echo.private('chat.123').listen('MessageCreated', callback)
 *

get.description: Retrieve the about us information. Available to both users and admins.

description.example: We provide professional nursing care services

put.description: Update the about us information. Only accessible by admins.

description.example: We provide professional nursing care services
We provide professional nursing care services

get.summary: Get all areas with user counts
get.description: Retrieve all areas with user count information for admin management

200.description: List of all areas with user counts

post.description: Create a new area for user registration and service pricing

get.summary: Get a specific area with details
get.description: Retrieve a specific area with user and service price details

200.description: Area details with user and service price information

delete.description: Delete an area if it has no users or service prices assigned

400.description: Cannot delete area with users or service prices

message.example: Cannot delete area that has users assigned to it.

get.description: Retrieve all contact form submissions for admin review

description.example: I need nursing care for my elderly mother

get.description: Retrieve a specific contact form submission with detailed information

description.example: I need nursing care for my elderly mother

get.summary: List custom notifications sent by admin
get.description: Get all custom notifications sent by the authenticated admin

post.description: Admin can send a custom notification to any user

user_id.description: ID of the user to send notification to

message.example: You have received a special welcome bonus!

get.summary: List all users for notification targeting
get.description: Get a list of all users that admin can send notifications to

We offer a wide range of nursing services including home care, elderly care, and specialized medical assistance.

faq_ids.description: Array of FAQ IDs in the desired order

get.description: Retrieve all popups for admin management. Accessible only to administrators.

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features...

post.description: Create a new popup with image upload and scheduling options. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: Popup image file (JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB) - Optional

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features and improvements.

get.description: Retrieve a specific popup by ID. Accessible only to administrators.

put.description: Update an existing popup. Image upload is optional. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: New popup image file (optional, JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete a popup and its associated image from Firebase. Accessible only to administrators.

get.summary: List all service area prices (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieve a list of all service area prices for admin management.

post.description: Create a new service area price for region-based pricing.

price.description: Price for this service in this area

put.description: Update an existing service area price.

price.description: New price for this service in this area

get.summary: Get prices for a specific service (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieve all area prices for a specific service.
Retrieve all sliders for admin management. Accessible only to administrators.

post.description: Create a new slider with image upload. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: Slider image file (JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB) - Optional

get.description: Retrieve a specific slider by ID. Accessible only to administrators.

put.description: Update an existing slider. Image upload is optional. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: New slider image file (optional, JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete a slider and its associated image from Firebase. Accessible only to administrators.

post.description: Reorder sliders by providing an array of slider IDs in the desired order

slider_ids.description: Array of slider IDs in the desired order

get.description: View all requests for a specific user to help admin decide on discount application. Shows total sessions and spending to help with discount decisions.

thread_id.description: Chat thread ID for admin-user communication

get.summary: Get active popup for app launch
get.description: Retrieve the currently active popup for app opening. Returns the most recent active popup where start_date is null or <= now, end_date is null or > now, and is_active = true. Accessible to both users and admins.

200.description: Active popup retrieved successfully or no active popup available

image.description: Firebase Storage URL for popup image

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features...

get.description: Retrieve all active sliders ordered by position for homepage display. Accessible to both users and admins.

image.description: Firebase Storage URL for slider image

get.description: Generate a JWT token for Stream.io chat authentication. This token is required by the Flutter frontend to connect to Stream.io chat services. The token contains the user ID and is signed with the Stream.io API secret.

api_key.description: Stream.io API key for frontend connection

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Token generation failed

put.description: Update an existing user's profile information in Stream.io chat system. This is typically called when a user updates their profile information.

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to update user in Stream.io

error.example: Failed to update user in Stream.io

post.description: Create a new user profile in Stream.io chat system. This is typically called after user registration to ensure the user exists in both Laravel and Stream.io systems.

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to create user in Stream.io

error.example: Failed to create user in Stream.io

post.description: Create a new chat channel in Stream.io. This is typically used for creating group chats, support channels, or any other type of messaging channel.

channel_type.description: Type of channel (e.g., messaging, livestream, team, etc.)

members.description: Array of user IDs to add as members

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to create channel in Stream.io

error.example: Failed to create channel in Stream.io

post.description: Add one or more users to an existing Stream.io channel. This is useful for inviting users to group chats or adding new members to support channels.

members.description: Array of user IDs to add as members

message.example: Members added successfully to channel in Stream.io

data.description: Updated channel data with new members

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to add members to channel

error.example: Failed to add members to channel in Stream.io

post.description: Send a text message to a specific Stream.io channel. This is typically used for system-generated messages or automated notifications.

message.example: Hello! This is a system message.

parent_id.description: ID of parent message for replies

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to send message

error.example: Failed to send message in Stream.io

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available areas for user registration and profile updates.

post.description: Register a new user with name, email, phone number, and password. Sends OTP via WhatsApp for verification.

birth_date.description: User's birth date (YYYY-MM-DD) - optional, used for birthday notifications

area_id.description: User's area/region ID (required for region-based pricing)

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your WhatsApp for the OTP.

error.example: Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.description: Verify the OTP sent to user's phone number via WhatsApp/SMS
Authenticate user with email and password

message.example: Your phone number is not verified.

post.description: Logout user and invalidate current token
Send OTP to user's phone number for password reset

message.example: OTP sent successfully. Please check your phone.
User with this phone number does not exist.
Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.description: Reset user password using OTP verification
Resend OTP verification code to user's phone number

message.example: User with this phone number does not exist.
Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories. Available to both users and admins.

image_url.description: Firebase Storage URL for category image

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category. Available to both users and admins.

image_url.description: Firebase Storage URL for category image

post.description: Create a new category with optional image. Only accessible by admins. If image upload fails, a 422 error is returned with a message.

422.description: Validation error or failed image upload

put.description: Update a category's information. Only accessible by admins.

delete.description: Delete a category from the system. Cannot delete if it has associated services. Only accessible by admins.

400.description: Cannot delete category with associated services

message.example: Cannot delete category with associated services.

post.summary: Open chat thread for service request
post.description: Opens a new chat thread for a service request or returns existing thread. Only the request owner or an admin can open a chat thread. Creates a temporary communication channel for real-time messaging during service delivery.

get.description: Retrieves paginated messages from a chat thread. Messages are ordered by ID descending (newest first) and support cursor-based pagination for efficient loading of large conversation histories.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of messages per page (max 50, default 20)

nextCursor.description: Next cursor for pagination (null if no more messages)

post.summary: Post new message to chat thread
post.description: Posts a new message to a chat thread. Supports three message types: text, image, and location. For image messages, mediaPath must be a valid storage path. For location messages, lat and lng coordinates are required. Messages trigger real-time broadcasting to thread participants.

422.description: Validation error - Invalid message data or media path

post.summary: Get signed URL for image upload
post.description: Retrieves a signed URL for uploading an image directly to storage. The client uses this URL to upload the image, then sends the mediaPath when posting the message.

filename.description: Original filename (used for generating unique storage path)

mediaPath.description: Storage path to use when posting the message

headers.description: HTTP headers to use during upload

422.description: Validation error - Invalid content type or missing parameters

patch.summary: Close chat thread and trigger cleanup
patch.description: Closes a chat thread and triggers automatic cleanup of messages and media. Once closed, no new messages can be posted. Background job processes media deletion and optional message redaction based on configuration.

post.description: Submit a contact form with user information and problem description. Authentication required.

description.description: Description of the problem or inquiry
description.example: I need nursing care for my elderly mother
I need nursing care for my elderly mother

get.summary: Get all active FAQs with translations
get.description: Retrieve all active FAQs ordered by their display order with content translated based on Accept-Language header. Authentication required.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects FAQ content

200.description: List of active FAQs with translations

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

get.summary: Get a specific FAQ with translations
get.description: Retrieve a specific FAQ by its ID with content translated based on Accept-Language header. Authentication required.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects FAQ content

answer.example: Ù†Ù‚Ø¯Ù… Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© ÙˆØ§Ø³Ø¹Ø© Ù…Ù† Ø®Ø¯Ù…Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØªÙ…Ø±ÙŠØ¶

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all notifications for the authenticated user.

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Delete a specific notification for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all nurses. Available to both users and admins.

post.description: Create a new nurse account. Only accessible by admins.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific nurse including ratings. Available to both users and admins.

put.description: Update a nurse's information. Only accessible by admins.

delete.description: Delete a nurse from the system. Only accessible by admins.

post.description: Submit a rating and comment for a nurse. Only accessible by users.

message.example: You have already rated this nurse.

get.description: Retrieve all requests with comprehensive order tracking. Users see only their own requests, admins see all requests. Latitude/longitude come from user location info, time_needed_to_arrive is cached and decreases over time.

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

status.description: 4-stage order tracking: submitted â†’ assigned â†’ in_progress â†’ completed

latitude.description: From user location info, not stored in requests table

longitude.description: From user location info, not stored in requests table

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Cached time in minutes, decreases over time, auto-updates status to in_progress when reaches 0

thread_id.description: Chat thread ID for admin-user communication

total_price.description: Price calculated based on request area

post.description: Create a new service request. Only accessible by users.

full_name.description: Full name of the person needing care

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

area_id.description: Optional: Area ID for region-specific pricing. If not provided, uses user's registered area

scheduled_time.description: For immediate requests: use now(). For scheduled: use future time

ending_time.description: Required only for scheduled appointments (not immediate requests)

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

total_price.description: Price calculated based on selected area

get.summary: Get user's default area for request creation
get.description: Get the user's registered area to use as default in the request creation form. This allows the frontend to pre-select the user's area while still allowing them to change it.

get.summary: Get request details with order tracking
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific request with 4-stage order tracking. Users can only view their own requests, admins can view any request. Real-time time_needed_to_arrive countdown and automatic status progression.

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Live countdown in minutes, auto-triggers status change to in_progress when reaches 0

thread_id.description: Chat thread ID for admin-user communication

total_price.description: Price calculated based on request area

put.description: Update a request. Only accessible by admins.

full_name.description: Full name of the person needing care

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Time in minutes needed to arrive

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

delete.description: Soft delete a request. The request is removed from admin view but remains available to users. Only accessible by admins.

message.example: Request removed from admin view, but still available to users.

get.summary: List all services with area-based pricing and translations
get.description: Retrieve a list of all services with pricing based on user's area and content translated based on Accept-Language header. If user has an area assigned and area-specific pricing exists, shows area price and area name. Otherwise shows original price without area information.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects service names

price.description: Area-specific price if user has area and pricing exists, otherwise original price

area_name.description: Area name (only included when showing area-specific pricing)

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

post.description: Create a new service. Only accessible by admins.

discount_price.description: Discounted price (must be less than regular price)

service_pic.description: URL to service picture (stored as URL string, not file upload)

category_id.description: Category ID (REQUIRED - must be valid category)

get.summary: Get a specific service with area-based pricing and translations
get.description: Retrieve a specific service with pricing based on user's area and content translated based on Accept-Language header.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects service names

area_name.description: Area name (only included when showing area-specific pricing)

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

put.description: Update a service's information. Only accessible by admins.

discount_price.description: Discounted price (must be less than regular price)

service_pic.description: URL to service picture (stored as URL string, not file upload)

category_id.description: Category ID (must be valid category if provided)

delete.description: Delete a service from the system. Only accessible by admins.

get.summary: Get pricing quote for services in a specific area
get.description: Get pricing information for multiple services in a specific area. This allows users to preview pricing before creating a request.

get.summary: Get all services for a specific area with pricing and translations
get.description: Retrieve all services available in a specific area with area-specific pricing when available, fallback to base prices when area pricing doesn't exist. Content is translated based on Accept-Language header.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects service names

price.description: Area-specific price if available, otherwise base price

area_name.description: Area name (only included when showing area-specific pricing)

has_area_pricing.description: Whether this service has area-specific pricing

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

description.example: Updated URL for job application redirect
Updated URL for job application redirect

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve a specific user's details by ID. Only accessible by admins.

put.description: Update user profile information. Users can only update their own profile, admins can update any user.

birth_date.description: User's birth date (YYYY-MM-DD) - used for birthday notifications

area_id.description: User's area/region ID for region-based pricing

get.description: Retrieve user dashboard with active requests count and recent services

post.summary: Submit user location on first login
post.description: Submit user's location coordinates on first login. Can only be called once per user.

get.description: Retrieve admin dashboard with system statistics
Retrieve a list of all users in the system. Only accessible by admins.

post.description: Create a new user account. Only accessible by admins.

birth_date.description: User's birth date (YYYY-MM-DD) - optional, used for birthday notifications

role_id.description: User role ID (optional, defaults to user)

delete.description: Delete a user account from the system. Only accessible by admins.

media_url.description: Signed URL for image messages (temporary access)

admin_id.description: Admin user ID (if admin opened thread)

mediaPath.description: Storage path for image (required for image messages, must belong to thread)
